short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search once, find and compare products on major online stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search only once. The extension will display the product search results on: Amazon, Walmart, Target, Walgreens and Costco. 

There are two ways to use this extension:
1) Type "shop" (case sensitive) in Chrome address bar, then space, then your search query.
2) Click on the extension icon, and use the search box in the popup window.

Let use know your feedback and we can expand to more sites.
